history.content:
Hi Everyone, Research IT department is hosting a Sensitive and Protected Data Workshop today 3:00 pm at 117 Dwinelle, please drop by if you are interested! register for this workshop here.

Here is some detailed info:


Thursday, December 5, 2019 - 3:00 pm at 117 Dwinelle (Academic Innovation Studio)

Data security and privacy increasingly shape research practices at UC Berkeley. Join us for a workshop using sensitive and protected data.
We’ll help you understand data security practices and navigate obstacles. You will learn how to classify your data according to campus standards, appropriately use campus-wide storage offerings, and take advantage of newly available computing services. 
This workshop is for current and prospective users of sensitive and protected data from all disciplines from Genomics to the Digital Humanities. We will discuss how to use protected data on Savio, Berkeley’s high-performance computing cluster and on the AEoD virtual machine service.
history.subject: TODAY! Working with Sensitive and Protected Data Workshop
